--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Karl Lewin <lewinke67@y...> wrote:
> Does anyone have any statistics for NEAT applied to
> the 4 Input XOR problem (4 inputs, return true if
> number of high inputs is odd)?
> 
> 
> 

I don't know of any experiments on this with NEAT.  XOR's are not 
necessarily good benchmarks though...they tend to have very unusual 
characteristics.

ken
